result.execSummary:
All charges against Jon F Moreland in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Jon F Moreland is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jon F Moreland

records.addlTxt:
1:46 PM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Jon F Moreland in court, in custody.  Attorney Jeffrey Warren Erickson in court for Jon F Moreland.  Attorney Luke Steiner in court for State of Wisconsin. 

22CF149 and 22CF122 called for initial appearances.

Attorney Erickson is heard.  Appears in all defendants cases, but will make a special appearance for 22CF149.

22CF149 - Court informs defendant of nature of charges and penalty sections of criminal complaint for each count.  Defendant states understanding.   
22CF122 - Court informs defendant of nature of charges and penalty sections of criminal complaint for each count.  Defendant states understanding.  

2:35 PM 
22CF149
Attorney Erickson is heard on bond. Requests a signature bond.
State is heard. Does not recommend bond modification. 
Court reduces the bond to $500.00 cash bond. Defendant is not to possess or consume controlled substances except those specifically prescribed to the defendant. Defendant is to submit to random urinalysis at the request of law enforcement.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Initial appearance on October 5, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

9:36 AM Case called - appearances stated. 
Defendant Jon F Moreland not in court.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Atty Steiner requests a warrant issue and def. be held
Court authorizes a warrant and def. is to be held for a bond hearing

1:11 PM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Jon F Moreland appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Court informs defendant of nature of charges and penalty sections of criminal complaint for each count.  Defendant states understanding.  Right to counsel is explained.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 1, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 1, 2022 at 09:30 am.

11:15 am Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Jon Francis Moreland appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Court notes five pending cases. 

Court finds probable cause. 

State is heard on bond. State recommends $1,000.00 cash bond. Defendant is not to possess or consume controlled substances except those specifically prescribed to the defendant. Defendant is to submit to random urinalysis at the request of law enforcement and if results are positive or defendant refuses, defendant shall submit to blood draw. 

Defendant comments.  

Court comments.

Court orders $1,000.00 cash bond. Defendant is not to possess or consume controlled substances except those specifically prescribed to the defendant. Defendant is to submit to random urinalysis at the request of law enforcement and if results are positive or defendant refuses, defendant shall submit to blood draw. Defendant not to operate motor vehicle without valid Drivers License. 

Court advises right to an attorney.
Hearing scheduled for August 24, 2022 at 01:10 pm.
